vi: Oi! Did you hear me, or are you deaf and blind, you prick?

Sori, be ddeudaist di, mêt?
vi: Sorry, what did you say, mate?

en: Mêt. Pwy ffwc ti'n galw'n mêt all of a sudden?
vi: Mate? Who the fuck are you calling a mate?

en: Nobody move tan dw i'n deud, iawn?
vi: Nobody move until I say, OK?

en: 'Dyn nhw'm callach bod ni efo'n gilydd.
vi: They don't know we're with them.

en: Sori, Chief.
vi: Sorry, chief.

en: Eniwes, dw i'n codi rownd, yli, so be gymrwch chi'ch dau?
vi: I'm getting a round in, so, what would you like?

en: Oh, awesome!
vi: Oh, awesome!

en: Nice one.
vi: Nice one. You don't have to, mate.

en: 'Sdim rhaid i chdi, 'sti, mêt.
'Mond tynnu dy goes ti oeddan ni, ynde, Sgoti?
vi: I was only pulling your leg, wasn't I, Scotty?

en: Ia, siŵr. Too right.
vi: Yes, too right.

en: Wel, dau botel o lager plîs, buddy.
vi: Two bottles of lager please, buddy.

en: Dyrro fo ar fy nhab i, plîs.
vi: Put it on my tab…

en: A cyma un i chdi dy hun hefyd ia.
vi: and get one for yourself.

en: Diolch yn fawr iawn i ti.
vi: Thanks, don't mind if I do.

en: Don't mind if I do.
Well handled, Carbo.
vi: Well-handled, Carbo.

en: - Ti'n 'nabod nhw? - Nope.
vi: -Do you know them? -Nope. I don't want to, either.

en: Dw i'm isio chwaith.
Gymi di sgampan?
vi: Want some scampi fries?

en: Winner stays on, ia?
vi: Winner stays on?

en: Ma'n iawn 'sti, mêt. 'Dan ni bron a gorffen, yli.
vi: It's OK, mate. We've almost finished.

en: 'Dan ni'n gadael ar ôl hwn, beth bynnag.
vi: We're going after this.

en: -Gowch chi'r bwrdd wedyn hogia. -O, na 'chdi bechod.
vi: -You can have the table then. -Oh, shame.

en: 'Swn i'm yn meindio plannu fy nghiw a dau belan reit fyny fy fisus di.
vi: I wouldn't mind putting my cue and two balls up your missus.

en: Reit - final warning, Snels. Dw i'n warnio chdi.
vi: Right, final warning, Snails.

en: Ti'n screwed os gei di dy fanio o fan'ma
vi: You'll be screwed if you get banned from here.

en: achos ti'n banned o bob man arall yn y sir, felly piss off o 'ma
vi: You're banned from every pub in the county, so piss off…

en: os nad ti'n gallu parchu pobl sy 'ma, iawn?
vi: -if you can't respect customers. - OK, take a chill pill, Jan!

en: Ia, oce.
Take a chill pill, Jan!
Bach o banter ydy o.
vi: Only a bit of banter.

en: Gei di dy gêm ar ôl i ni ddarfod, iawn.
vi: You can play after us.

en: Fucking hell, ma' hi'n gallu siarad! Ti isio chwara efo fi, dol?
vi: Fucking hell, she speaks!

en: 'Cause I could play with you all night long, babes.
vi: Fancy playing with me? I could play with you all night long, babes.

en: Cau hi neu mi sticia i dy ben di i fyny dy din di
vi: Shut it, or I'll shove your head up your arse…

en: a dy rowlio di nôl lawr y twll 'na ddringaist di allan ohono fo.
vi: and roll you back down the hole you just climbed out of.

en: 'Mond 'di dod yma am gêm o killer ydan ni sdi
vi:
We're only here
 to play killer…

en: felly gad iddi gymryd ei siot, ia?
vi: so let her take the shot.

en: A dos adre i gymryd mwy o steroids.
vi: Go home to take more steroids.

en: Glywaist di hynna, Sgoti?
vi: Hear that, Scotty?

en: Fighting talk.
vi: Fighting talk.

en: Music to my ears.
vi: Music to my ears.

en: Well, come on, then, hero!
vi: Well come on, then, hero! Bring it on, mate!

en: Tyrd ta, mêt...
...let's see what you've got
vi: Let's see what you've got and I'll open you up like a tin of sardines.

en: and I'll open you up like a tin of sardines.
Nefyl, na! Ti'n gwbod pwy ydy hwn, dwyt?
vi: No, Neville! You do know who he is, don’t you?

en: Carwyn 'dy o. Roedd o yn yr ysgol efo ni yn Port 's'talwm.
vi: Carwyn was in school with us

en: Ti'n gwbod pwy 'dy o, dwyt?
vi:
in Port long ago.
 You know who he is.

en: Well, I never.
vi: Well, I never.

en: Ia, 'fyd.
vi: You're right.

en: Carwyn bach 'dy o, 'fyd.
vi: It's Carwyn.

en: Dw i'n sori am hynna, mêt.
vi: Sorry, mate.

en: -Wnes i'm 'nabod chdi. -All cwl, ia, hogia.
vi: -I didn't recognize you. - All cool.

en: Long time no see and all that.
vi: Long time no see and all that.

en: Ia.
vi: Yes.

en: Reit, sgiwshwch ni, hogia. 'Sa'n well i ni fynd.
vi: Right, excuse us, lads, we'd better go.

en: Be sy'n bod, Carwyn bach?
vi: What's wrong, Carwyn? Not good enough for you now, are we?

en: Ddim digon da i chdi dyddiau 'ma, na 'dan?
Oeddan ni'n arfer bod yn ddigon da i chdi ers talwm, doeddan?
vi: We were good enough for you once.

en: Fel deudais i, hen bryd i ni adael.
vi:
As I said…
 We have to go.

en: Felly, wela i chi rywbryd eto am beint, hogia.
vi: I'll see you again for a pint.

en: -Nos dawch. -Ti'n gwbod be?
vi:
Goodnight.
 If I remember rightly, you were a mummy's boy in primary school.

en: Os dw i'n cofio, babi Mam oeddach chi yn yr ysgol gynradd 'fyd.
Rhedeg ati bob munud am ditsan am bod Dadi 'di marw.
vi: Always running to her for some titty 'cause Dad was dead.

en: -Paid cymryd sylw ohono fo. -Be?
vi: -Ignore him. -What?

en: O, cym on!
vi: Oh, come on.

en: O'n i'n meddwl bod ni'n mêts.
vi: I thought we were mates.

en: A be ddigwyddodd i Dadi 'fyd, Carwyn? Hmm?
vi: What happened to Daddy again, Carwyn? Hm?

en: O, ia.
vi: Oh, yes.

en: Dw i'n cofio rwan.
vi: I remember.

en: Hongian ei hun yn jail nath o 'de, Carwyn bach?
vi: He hung himself in jail, didn't he, Carwyn?

en: 'Cause he couldn't handle it inside.
vi: 'Cause he couldn't handle it inside.

en: What a wan--
vi: What a wan--
